text: The Good luck knot can be seen in images of the knot carved on a statue of the Asian Goddess of Mercy, Guanyin, which was created between AD 557 and 588, and later found in a cave in northwest China The Ultimate Book of Decorative Knots by Lindsey Philpott (2010) — p 326 — {| class="wikitable" ! width="25%" |Knot Name ! width="25%" |Source |- |吉祥結 Good Luck Knot |Chen 1 — p 81Lydia Chen.
